Question
========
Which of the following is highlighted as a strength of R?

Answerlist
----------
* It is open source, cross-platform, and backed by a rich package ecosystem
* It is proprietary and limited to one operating system
* It cannot produce graphics without third-party software
* It has no community support for data analysis

Solution
========
R is free, runs across platforms, and offers many packages and community support, making it strong for data analysis and graphics.

Answerlist
----------
* True
* False
* False
* False
